1.text: Spawn 2 Level I Enemies. If both survive the third turn they upgrade to Level II Enemies.

2.text: Each Player rolls 1d6: 1 - 2: Discard a Weapon, if there is no Weapon to lose, each Player loses 2 Life. 3 - 4: Gain +2 Life. 5 - 6: Gain +1 Energy.

3.text: Spawn 1 Level I Enemy. If defeated in 1 turn draw an extra Encounter card. You can replace the next Encouder with this card.

4.text: Each Player draws a Weapon. Next Enemy you fight has -1 Shield.

5.text: Each Player may retrive 1 card from discarded. Doing so costs 3 Energy.

6.text: Players skip next turn unless they discard 1 Weapon. If both Players skip they gain +1 Energy.

10.text: Restore +2 Energy to each Player. A Player draws a Weapon.

13.text: Spawn 1 Level II Enemy. Roll 1d6: 1 : Each Player loses 1 Energy. 2 - 5: Each Player gains +5 Life. 6: Each Player gains +5 Energy.

14.text: Spawn 1 Level II Enemy. Roll 1d6: 1 : Each Player loses 3 Life. 2 - 4: Each Player gains +3 Energy. 5 - 6: Each Player draws a Weapon.

15.text: Roll 1d6: 1 - 3: Each Player loses 2 Life. 4 - 6: Each Player gains +2 Energy.

16.text: A Player gains an extra attack in the next battle, the other Player gains +5 Life.

1.text: Spawn 1 Level I Enemy and 1 Level II Enemy. Every turn roll 1d6: 1 - 2: Each Player takes 2 damage. 3 - 4: Each Player gains +2 Energy. 5 - 6: Each Enemy takes 2 damage.

2.text: Choose One: - Draw a Weapon. - Restore +3 Life to each Player.

3.text: Each Player takes 1 damage per card in its hand. If you discard a Weapon, reduce next damage by half.

4.text: Spawn 2 Level I Enemies. If either survives 2 turns they gain +2 Attack.

5.text: Spawn 2 Level I Enemies. If either survives 2 turns they gain +2 Attack.

6.text: Choose one: - One Weapon gains +2 Attack in the next battle. - Restore 5 Life split between Players.

7.text: Spawn 1 Level II Enemy. At the start of battle Enemy deals 1 damage to the most offensive Player.

8.text: Spawn 1 Level II Enemy. At the start of battle Enemy deals 3 damage to the most offensive Player.

9.text: A Player equips the first Weapon from the Used Weapon Deck. Then shuffle the Used Weapon deck.

10.text: Draw 2 Weapons. Keep 1 for free. To keep both Weapons a Player must lose 5 Life.

11.text: Choose one: - Spawn 2 Level I Enemies. - Spawn 1 Level II Enemy.

12.text: Spawn 1 Level II Enemy. Each Player loses 1 Energy per turn unless they use only basic attacks.

14.text: A Player loses a Weapon. The other Player gains +3 Energy.

15.text: Spawn 2 Level I Enemies. If you defeat them both in 2 turns each Player draws a Weapon.

16.text: Each Player discards a Weapon and loses 1 Energy. If a Player has no Weapons he gains 3 Energy.

1.text: Search the used Weapon deck for any card of your choice. Pay 2 Energy to take it or discard it. 1 Weapon per Player.

2.text: Spawn 1 Level III Enemy. Each Player rolls 1d6: 1 - 2: You can not use Energy in this fight. 3 - 6: You gain +2 Shield in this fight.

3.text: Choose one: - Each Player draws a Weapon. - Each Player gains a permanent +1 Shield.

4.text: Spawn 1 Level III Enemy. Roll 1d6: 1 - 3: Players lose 2 Energy. 1 - 3: Players lose 5 Life.

5.text: Lose 20 Life split between Players and search the Weapons deck for an Ultimate Weapon. A Player takes it on his hand. Then suffle the Weapons Deck. Decline and gain +10 Life.

6.text: Spawn 1 Level I Enemy and 1 Level II Enemy. Every turn roll 1d6: 1 - 3: Each Player takes 2 damage. 4 - 6: Each Enemy gets -1 Shield.

7.text: Roll 1d6: 1 - 2: Spawn 2 Level I Enemies. 3 - 4: Spawn 1 Level II Enemy. 5 - 6: Spawn 1 Level III Enemy and all Players gain +1 Energy.

8.text: Roll 1d6: 1 - 2: Spawn 1 Level II Enemy. 3 - 4: Spawn 1 Level II Enemy and 1 Level I Enemy. 5 - 6: Spawn 1 Level III Enemy and all Players gain +1 Energy.

9.text: Each Player loses 2 Energy. If either has no Energy left, each Player takes 3 damage instead.

10.text: Spawn 1 Level II Enemy and 1 Level III Enemy.

11.text: Choose one: - Spawn 2 Level II Enemies. - Spawn 1 Level III Enemy.

12.text: Search the Used Weapon Deck for a card of your choice. Pay 3 Energy to equip it. For 1 Player only.

13.text: Spawn 1 Level III Enemy and 1 Level I Enemy.Weapons cost +1 Energy in this battle.

14.text: Each Player draws a Weapon. Each Player gains +6 Life.

15.text: A Player must discard a weapon and the other Player loses 5 life. If not each player loses 2 Energy.

16.text: Choose one: - Spawn 2 Level II Enemies. - Spawn 1 Level III and 1 Level I Enemy.
